trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Cartersville
There were no other sightings in Cartersville on or around February 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsabout 150 am was smoking a cig had my window open(blowing smoke out window)noticed a very bright light inside the clouds,about the same time power went out as light went over home and around the area the power came back on after light went further away.alarms to the local biz went off,all of them cops even howed up to the alarms,never saw an object,just bright light holy crap how bright it was,power was out aprox 2 minas light pased over.felt very at ease when i saw it.
